Posts.Content: I am a breast cancer survivor (almost 3 years now) and I'm starting a new project called ALIVE FOR 5 that will help celebrate 5-year anniversaries for cancer survivors. Survivors will be able to send us their upcoming 5-year "cancerversary" date and we will announce those survivors on our site on that day - helping them to celebrate this milestone and also giving hope to those that are still fighting every day to survive. For now, we just have a launch page up that allows you to provide your email address so that we can contact you when the site goes live. Please stop by AliveFor5.com  and" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://www.AliveFor5.com  and enter your email address to show your support.   Thanks! -Kristen AliveFor5.com HealthyCancerChick.com
Posts.Title: Share your upcoming 5-year cancerversary date
